title: Latest 7/12 extracts or property register card of a date notearlierthan six months prior to the date of submission of development proposal, power of attorney, wherever applicable or attested copy of lease deed of the concerned lessor authority, enabling ownership of the document
clause_text: Latest 7/12 extracts or property register card of a date notearlierthan six months prior to the date of submission of development proposal, power of attorney, wherever applicable or attested copy of lease deed of the concerned lessor authority, enabling ownership of the document. In case of Ulhasnagar, conveyance deed and/or sanad issued by the Revenue Authority may also be considered.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
